SEARCH
Package uk.msci.project.rsa

Class GenModelComparisonBenchmarking

java.lang.Object
uk.msci.project.rsa.GenModel
uk.msci.project.rsa.GenModelBenchmarking
uk.msci.project.rsa.GenModelComparisonBenchmarking
public class GenModelComparisonBenchmarking extends GenModelBenchmarking
This class extends the GenModelBenchmarking class to specialise in comparison benchmarking scenarios. This class is integral for facilitating RSA key generation in scenarios where direct comparisons between different key configurations and parameters are required on a per key size basis. It supports the generation and analysis of keys across various key sizes and configurations. The class is equipped to handle both default key configuration comparisons (standard vs provably secure) and custom-defined key configurations. This includes generating keys based on user-specified key sizes, managing trial runs for performance measurement, and formatting results for both predefined and custom comparison modes.

  • Method Details

    • getDefaultKeyConfigurationsData

      public List<javafx.util.Pair<int[],Boolean>> getDefaultKeyConfigurationsData()
      Generates a default set of key configurations for comparison mode. This method creates key configurations based on predefined fractions and small e selection settings.
      Overrides:
      getDefaultKeyConfigurationsData in class GenModelBenchmarking
      Returns:
      A list of pairs, each containing an array of integers (representing fractions of key sizes) and a boolean (indicating small e selection).

    • batchGenerateKeysInComparisonMode

      public void batchGenerateKeysInComparisonMode(List<javafx.util.Pair<int[],Boolean>> keyConfigurationsData, List<Integer> keySizes, int numTrials, DoubleConsumer progressUpdater)
      Performs batch generation of RSA keys in comparison mode. This method generates keys based on provided key configurations data and sizes. It updates the progress of the batch generation using the provided progress updater.
      Parameters:
      keyConfigurationsData - The list of key configurations' data.
      keySizes - The list of key sizes.
      numTrials - The number of trials to be conducted.
      progressUpdater - A DoubleConsumer to report the progress of batch generation.

    • formatCustomKeyConfigurations

      public List<String> formatCustomKeyConfigurations(List<javafx.util.Pair<int[],Boolean>> keyConfigurationsData)
      Formats the custom key configurations into a human-readable string format. Each key configuration is converted into a string describing the number of primes, their fractions, and small e selection.
      Overrides:
      formatCustomKeyConfigurations in class GenModelBenchmarking
      Parameters:
      keyConfigurationsData - The list of key configurations data to format.
      Returns:
      A list of formatted string representations of the key configurations.

    • formatDefaultKeyConfigurations

      public List<String> formatDefaultKeyConfigurations()
      Formats the default key configurations for comparison mode into a human-readable string format. This method returns predefined string descriptions for each of the standard comparison modes.
      Overrides:
      formatDefaultKeyConfigurations in class GenModelBenchmarking
      Returns:
      A list of formatted string representations of the default key configurations for comparison mode.

    • getNumKeySizesForComparisonMode

      public int getNumKeySizesForComparisonMode()
      Retrieves the number of different key sizes used in comparison benchmarking mode. This count is important for managing comparisons across various key configurations in both default and custom comparison modes. In the default mode, it refers to comparing standard versus provably secure parameters, while in the custom mode, it applies to user-defined configurations.
      Overrides:
      getNumKeySizesForComparisonMode in class GenModelBenchmarking
      Returns:
      The number of different key sizes used in comparison benchmarking mode.
